text: New Yorkers have the reputation for wearing all black. All year round. But this is not a dress code that applies to Los Angeles - born, former New York resident Gigi Hadid. On Thursday, the supermodel was spotted walking down the street in SoHo rocking a pair of high - waisted, flowing white pants that feature thigh - high splits up the sides that were dangerously close to coming in contact with the slush on the sidewalk. She paired the chic trousers with an off - white sweater, a small M2malletier backpack, sunglasses, and knee - high snakeskin boots.
